name: WS Coupon Woocommerce
author: Wojciech Skrzek

sections.description: Small plugin to show woocommerce coupons on the single product page – easily show your coupon in the box with a small animation.
sections.installation:
MANUAL INSTALLATION
The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favorite FTP application.

Download the plugin file to your computer and unzip it
Using an FTP program, or your hosting control panel, upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress installations wp-content/plugins/ directory.
Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu within the WordPress admin.

OR:
From your WordPress dashboard

Visit Plugins > Add New
Search for “WS Coupon Woocommerce”
Install the “WS Coupon Woocommerce” plugin
Activate “WS Coupon Woocommerce” from your Plugins page

short_description: Small plugin to show woocommerce coupons on the single product page
description: Small plugin to show woocommerce coupons on the single product page – easily show your coupon in the box with a small animation.
